name: Craftsmen Prototype
description:
Craft guns, shoot enemies, buy more gun parts to upgrade.

This is a very early build done in 8 weeks. Expect bugs, lacking features & horrendous balancing. 

Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Reload - R

Interact - E

Go to the blueprint, interact and craft a weapon. A weapon needs a magazine, a barrel and a grip. Good luck!
